aucBidMe.title: Auction First Bid Notification
aucBidMe.description: Receive a DM notification when one of your auctions receives an initial bid.

aucOutbid.title: Auction Outbid Notification
aucOutbid.description: Receive a DM notification when you are outbid on an auction.

aucNewBid.title: Auction New High Bid Notification
aucNewBid.description: Receive a DM notification when your previously bid on auction receives a new higher bid.

aucEnd.title: Auction End Notification
aucEnd.description: Receive a DM notification when one of your auctions ends.

announce.title: Bot Announcement Notification
announce.description: Receive a DM notification when there is a new bot announcement or notice.

daily.title: Daily Ready Notification
daily.description: Receive a DM notification when you can claim your `/daily`

vote.title: Vote Ready Notification
vote.description: Receive a DM notification when you can vote for the bot.

completed.title: Collection Completion/Incomplete Notification
completed.description: Receive a DM notification when you collect all the cards for a collection, as well as when you lose completion for a collection.

effectEnd.title: Effect Expires/Comes Off Cooldown Notification
effectEnd.description: Receive a DM notification when an effect of yours has expired or comes off cooldown.

canHas.title: Allow Others To Use /has On You
canHas.description: Enable or disable the ability for other users to use the `/has` command on you.

canDiff.title: Allow Others To Use /diff On You
canDiff.description: Enable or disable the ability for other users to use the `/diff` command on you.

canSell.title: Allow Others To Sell You Cards
canSell.description: Enable or disable the ability for other users to sell you cards via `/sell`

bio.title: Bio Setting
bio.description: Open the modal below to set your bio

title.title: Title Setting
title.description: Use the select menu below to set your title

color.title: Color Setting
color.description: Open the modal below to set your color

favCard.title: Favorite Card
favCard.description: Open the modal below to set your Favorite Card

favComplete.title: Favorite Completion
favComplete.description: Open the modal below to set your Favorite Collection Completion

favClout.title: Favorite Clouted Collection
favClout.description: Open the modal below to set your Favorite Clouted Collection

tables.title: Table Display Setting
tables.description:
Use the select menu below to change your table display style
A display of your currently selected option is below

notify.title: Notification Options
notify.description:
Use the select menu below to navigate to a Notification option.
Notification options manage when the bot will DM you.

interact.title: Interaction Settings
interact.description:
Use the select menu below to navigate to an Interaction option.
Interaction options change how others can interact with you.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Use the select menu below to navigate to a Profile option

display.title: Display Settings
display.description: Use the select menu below to navigate to a Display option
